array.name: errorMessages
array.item: The neutrinos have mutated. Refreshing suspension of disbelief.

array.name: loadingMessages
array.item: Making a collage out of funny mentions.

array.name: shareFirstChannelMessages
array.item: Hey, look! Here’s how much we’ve been chatting!
Wow, are we good friends or what?
Hey, wow, we’re not thinking about restraining orders yet, right?
This data proves we’re friends. You’re stuck with me! Ha!
You are the best digital friend!
This is proof we’re having a blast here!

array.name: shareOtherChannelMessages
array.item: I think we need to work on communication.
Hey, talk to me! We’re falling behind!
Hey, I miss you! Do you miss me?
Let’s talk about the meaning of life.

array.name: shareFirstUserMessages
array.item: Hey, look! Here’s how much we’ve been chatting!
Wow, are we good friends or what?
One of us must be a really good conversationalist!
Hey, wow, you’re not thinking about a restraining order yet, right?
I’m not sure I spend this much time talking to people in real life!
This data proves we’re friends. You’re stuck with me! Ha!

array.name: shareOtherUserMessages
array.item: I think we need to work on communication.
Hey, talk to me! We’re falling behind!
Hey, I miss you! Do you miss me?
Are we bad at small talk or what?
Let’s talk about the meaning of life.
